https://tmrev.io/movie/562082-Africa in Pieces: The Tragedy of the Great Lakes 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/sJOrhUU02UUBB4Xaam5AsYFEDxp.jpg April, 1994. Genocide in Rwanda. 800,000 dead. A catastrophe that upset the balance in the entire region. The Great Lakes region of Africa ended the year with a bloodbath. This documentary shows the intrigues, the dramatic effects, the treasons, the vengeances that prevailed over those years and whose only goal was to maintain or increase each factionâ€™s area of influence. In just ten years, the population saw all their hopes vanish: The dream of an Africa in control of its own destiny, alimentary self-sufficiency, the end of interethnic conflicts Africa in Pieces: The Tragedy of the Great Lakes
